case.state: I'm Sanako Isogai, thirty-f--- eighteen years old.

I'm Sanako Isogai, eighteen years old.

I have to make up for what happened last the last two rounds.

I'm on a roll!

Wow!

Don't worry about me. I just got lucky, that's all.

Yay!

Good.

You're so polite and well-mannered, Mei.

state.text: I love your dancing, Shantae. You are so energetic!

case.state: Okay!
I don't need to win, but it's nice to get a great hand from time to time!
Maybe if you can beat me, I'll let you keep these panties as a little souvenir.
Yes!
Look at that. Good cards at last.
You have to get up pretty early in the morning to outsmart a baker!

Wouldn't you like to know what I have in store for you...
I can't help but notice that you can't keep your eyes off me, ~player~.
May the best woman win.
I'll pull myself together by my bootstraps.

Oh dear! I might be the first one to lose.
Sorry to leave so soon, but I have a neighborhood board meeting to attend...
I know I shouldn't be disappointed, but I wanted to hold on a little longer.
Sorry, everyone! I'll be out of these panties in just a moment.

I'm useless!

Hmmm...

Oh...

Oops!

It's nice to meet you, Joetta. You can call me Sanako.

state.text: Then how would you feel if we added something magical to your name? How about "Kumatora Eternal"?

case.state: That's a beautiful scarf, young lady. It goes wonderfully with your lovely blonde hair.

Oh my! A fairy? Are you from the drama club?
Some of you really went all out on your costumes! The ladybird girl is very pretty.
Will the orb of light be playing with us too? There's a legend in my town that orbs of light can grant wishes.
Lady in purple, that's a daring look! I don't have anything that lets me show off my shoulders quite like that.
Hello over there! Is that some sort of camcorder? Are we on tape?

state.text: Of course there's no one I'm closer to me than my dear hus--- ah, I mean--- house band. That's right. You could say I'm the number one fan.

case.state: I have a feeling the three of us will have a great time!
This is the first round, so let's introduce ourselves!
Everybody is so cute. I hope we can have fun together.
I like the atmosphere in here. I wonder what it's like when it gets crowded.

Sorry to keep you waiting.
It's only fair that it's my turn now. I have the most to give.
I don't mind at all.

My ribbons? I can't! That only leaves me two options.
Lucky you! That's two in a row for me.
My name is Sanako Isogai. Please call me Sanako.
Oh dear...
It's my first loss, but hopefully not my last.
No problem. Leave it to me.
Lucky you! It's my turn again.
It certainly is hot in here today.

These are such nice panties. It seems a shame to take them off.
Oh, you're targeting me first? Even though I have the least to lose?
Oh, you're targeting me now? Even though I have the least to lose?
What?!
So that's it? So that's how it is?!
Me again? My breasts were just excess baggage to you, weren't they?
No problem. I'll take a turn now.
Are you sure you don't want to make the game last a bit longer? Maybe someone else could go before it's my turn again.
You all are very good at this game!
I spent years developing these pastries. I can't wait for you to try them.
This really brings back memories.
It's only fair that I take my socks off too.
I'm useless! Nothing but a burden to this game!
Will my shoes be enough? Do you need my socks too?
I want to help in any way that I can. How about I take off my socks too?
I thought I might take off my socks too if that's all right.
Of course, taking your shirt off is a normal part of strip poker.
This is a pretty groovy skirt, isn't it?
I won't blame you if you confess your love to me.
Have you been waiting to see this for all this time?
You're saying you don't like my panties?! That you wish I wasn't wearing them?!
I don't really mind going first, but it's someone else's turn next.
There! I'm ready for the next round.
This is my bra today. How do you like it?
I hope that seeing me in my panties will cheer you all up. I've been waiting all week to show them off.
I bought this two-piece set at one of the stores where all of the young people shop. What do you think of them?
So tell me, what do you think of my womanly ways?
These can be quite a handful sometimes.
Your happiness is my happiness as well.
What's wrong, honey? You look upset.

Someone that's not me has to take a turn first. And what's more, it's a boy!
We got him! Good work, everyone.
I'm sure we'd all be happy if you wanted to start taking the lead.
This game keeps getting better and better.
Would you mind taking a turn?
I'm glad everything worked out!
What a surprise, ~name~.
Here, let me help too, ~name~.

I'm so excited!

I'm so glad!
~Name~!

All right!
Oh! Hi!

I'm proud of you. Now you're a real part of the game!

~Name~?
Go, ~name~!
Care to join me, ~name~?

case.state: I'm going to be keeping my glasses on today. How about you, ~name~?

I hope this is okay with you.

There's nothing wrong with that.
Thanks. We appreciate it.

I'm impressed. I thought you were going to be one of those stern office ladies, but you're really getting into the spirit of things.
Great! You're really getting into the spirit of things, Mia.

case.state: That's the way, Mia! Now you're getting into the spirit of things.
If your life can change once, it can change again for the better.
Don't give up yet. If you work hard enough, you can do it.
~Name~ isn't playing hard-to-get, that's for sure.
If in doubt, just grin and bear it. That's what my mom used to tell me.
You can cover up now. We all saw, didn't we?
Thanks for going through with it. This game is so much more fun when everybody plays along.
Don't you feel better now? The hardest part is over.
Eh... eh... eh...
Stand up and keep fighting. You have to win for your own sake!
So... we decided that it's come to this...
Don't mind me if I pounce on you. I might not be able to control myself.
If... if you're sure that's what you want...
Wow! I'm really doing great today!
Don't mind me if I pounce on you, ~name~. I might not be able to control myself.
You know what to do next, ~name~. Show us how you do it.
~Name~ couldn't hold on any longer.
Yay!
Oh!
So nice of you to let a lady go first, ~name~.
And it was as soon as I took my bra off. You flatter me, ~name~!
You're just going for it? You didn't want one of us to start you off?
Ehe, don't mind us if we watch closely.
Go slow. We don't want this to be over too quickly.
Aw, those short little tugs are so cute.
Is... is it because you think I'm cute?
~Name~, please begin! It's impossible for me to do it alone without you!
We're all on edge, ~name~. Please begin.
Ah, yes! Ahh!
Don't be shy. We all want to see.
He's still going strong. Keep up the fight.
This is what the game is all about!
~Name~ is still going strong. Keep up the fight.
You're moving so violently!
I don't want to interrupt ~name~, but I just want to remind him to get my number after the game.
Does anyone else feel a little overheated?
Does seeing me in my underthings help, ~name~? You can touch the material if you like.
I'm sure I'll have something extra to keep you going next round, ~name~.
If you'd like to hold my panties while you do that, I wouldn't mind.
Mmmmmm. Mmm.
Oh my... Is he gonna confess his love to me?
You can come a little closer. We're in this together, after all.
Come to mama...
Could it be that ~name~ wants to make me his woman?
He really makes a splash, doesn't he?
That was close. Were you aiming for me?
Oh! What a sudden end.
~Name~ really makes a splash, doesn't he?
Good boy. Maybe I'll return the favor later.
Does anyone hav--- whoa! That was so sudden! Good job, ~name~.
Whoa, that's a lot of juice, buster!
It's more polite to let a lady join you when you do that.
Ah. Ah. Ah. Ah! Ah! Ah!
I hope you have more where that came from, mister.
My poor, innocent angel...
I'm so sorry, my darling Nagisa...
She's a real go-getter! She's getting an early start on all of us.
I'm sorry. This game must feel so unfair right now.
~Name~ is a real go-getter! She's getting an early start on all of us.
But she...
I'm sorry, ~name~. This game must feel so unfair right now.
It's so thoughtful of you to join in, ~name~. I know it will be appreciated.
Oh. I see.
If... if you wouldn't mind.
It's time to see you have some fun. And hear it too.
Eeep.
It's your turn now, ~name~.
It's okay if you don't want us to see. We'll still know if you're enjoying yourself.
If it makes you feel any better, most of us are going to have to do that too.
It's okay if you want to start now. I'll join you as soon as I can.
I really hope this is okay with you.
If this is too much for you, maybe the others would let me take your place.
If you'd like to borrow my skirt to cover yourself while you do that, just let me know.
At least you didn't have to go first.
I'm sure ~name~ is nervous, so let's take care of her, okay?
Remember: Every woman is different. You should enjoy yourself in whatever way you like best.
Hoh, oh, oh...
You can do it!
If you're feeling too embarrassed, maybe we could ask ~player~ to help.

state.text: My, Samus! How scandalous!

case.state: She must be a natural performer.
She seems to be enjoying herself, at least.
Don't misunderstand. I...
~Name~ must be a natural performer.
~Name~ seems to be enjoying herself, at least.
Now, now, let's not stare at poor ~name~.
If you'd like to slow down a little, ~name~, maybe all of us could do this together.
Those little chirps you keep making are just the cutest.
This is so precious.
~Name~ is coping so well. I wish I could adopt her.
Don't worry about the sounds you're making, ~name~. Those are all totally normal.
I thought you'd be the kind to take it slow, but you sure are getting into this, ~name~.
Mmmmmh. Mmmmmmmh.
Should we hold hands? Here, don't be shy.
Let's not get too loud.
Was I good enough when it was my turn? What do you think, ~player~?
Everyone gets a turn to show off.
Let me know if you want some tips. I read all of the ladies' magazines.
Maybe you should be a little more ladylike about this, ~name~.
The game is quickly drawing to a close.
Keep it down, you two!
Something a lot like this happened to me when I went to the public bathhouse one afternoon.
That was beautiful, Weiss. Thank you for sharing it with us. Was it your first time doing it in front of others?
Oh, but I was so close to joining you. I'm sorry that I wasn't able to show more solidarity.
We're so sorry!
I'm so sorry about your loss. This must be hard on you.
At least it's over now. You can breathe a sigh of relief.
Thank you for seeing this through all the way to the end.
I'm not sure, but did ~name~ just finish?
I'm sorry for lasting longer than you, but I hope you still enjoyed the game anyway.
Hah, ah, ah, ah...
That should take a little stress off of you, right?
All done! Did you have fun today?
M-Me first?
I was wondering when it would be my turn.
Feel free to look as much as you like!
No, it's okay. I don't mind if you watch. That's what we're here for, right?
Mmm. Mmm. Mmm.
Ah. Ahh. Aha.
Hhhhhuff... hhhhf...
Eh. Eheh. Ehheheh.
Ah! Haha! Ahh ahah...
Oh. Ahh.. ahh...
Mmmmmmm... mmmmmmm...
Hhhhh... hhhhh...
~player~...
M-m.. mme... mmmm...
Oh.. ohmi.. oh... Oh! OH! OH!
I'm sorry that I showed you all such shameful conduct...
I bet you didn't really expect me to go through with that. I'm still cool, you know.
Although I'm a little embarrassed, if I hadn't given it a shot, I never would have experienced so much happiness.
I didn't share too much during my penalty, did I? Sometimes I say things without even knowing it.
I'm content to sit here and watch.
You can look, but don't stare too much, okay?
Things sometimes take an unexpected turn, don't they?
Don't forget that I have some baked goodies for you all. I can't wait for you to taste my buns.
Give it your best out there, you two!
I don't want to play favorites, so good luck to all three of you.
Now this doesn't seem very fair, does it? If it's okay, I'd like to join you all.
If you're all done teasing me, I believe it's my turn.
I think the winner should get a little kiss, don't you?
None of you wanted to see me undressed. You think I'm ugly, don't you?
~Player~, let me give you my telephone number. We can play with each other more later.
You didn't even get to see me play with this. But I suppose there's always next game.
Yeah! I knew I could do it.
I don't want to feel left out. Should we all do it at the same time?
You should be proud, ~player~. It's not every day that such a strong, confident player gets the mastery over us.
~Name~, let me be the first to get your autograph.
If you don't mind, I'd like to do this again sometime.
